name: @wessberg/codeanalyzer
description: A service that can analyze your code in great detail ahead of time.

scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist & npm run clean:compiled
scripts.build:pre: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist/cjs/interface && mkdir -p dist/es2015/interface
scripts.build: npm run build:pre && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:es2015
scripts.test:pre: npm run clean:compiled && tsc --module commonjs --target es2017 --sourceMap
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=TEST npm run test:pre && time ava --fail-fast

author: Frederik Wessberg
